resources.string:
"Welcome to the arena of Oren young challenger!"
" You are here to fight, not because of a thirst for glory or adventure, but because you were caught in possession of jewels sourced from our local bank. 

" " You have been given the glorious, nay, miraculous opportunity to redeem yourself in the eyes of your king. 
 
" "You will fight for us. You will bleed for us. And whether or not you live and/or die, you will entertain us to the fullest. 
 
"
"Before we throw you in the pit, what is your name?"
